sentences.en: " A cask of Amontillado! " Fortunato repeated. " Where is it? "
sentences.cn: “ 一桶阿蒙帝来多酒! ” 菲顿纳多重复着, “ 在哪里? ”

sentences.en: And thereupon he sat down across the brandy cask, and began to fill a pipe.
sentences.cn: 说着,他就坐到了白兰地酒桶上, 开始装烟斗.

sentences.en: Anti - cask theory is based on the principles of the anti - cask principles.
sentences.cn: 反 木桶原理则是基于木桶原理而提出的反原理.

sentences.en: He asked the waiter to bring him a cask of sherry.
sentences.cn: 他叫侍者给他拿一桶雪利酒.

sentences.en: He drew some cognac from the cask into a tin cannikin.
sentences.cn: 他从酒桶里倒了一些白兰地到一只小锡杯里.

sentences.en: I need a cask of wine and some apples.
sentences.cn: 我需要一桶酒和一些苹果.

sentences.en: Mites are a tiny parasitic insect, the cask has some defensive effect.
sentences.cn: 螨虫是一种微小的寄生小虫, 木桶也有一定的防御效果.

sentences.en: Since then, Johnny Cask's career has soared.
sentences.cn: 在那以后, 约翰尼·卡什的事业突飞猛进.

sentences.en: Sit back and enjoy watching this cask of Scottish whisky maturing.
sentences.cn: 坐下来欣赏这个苏格兰威士忌成化的木桶吧.

sentences.en: The capacity of the mixing cask is about forty - one cubic feet.
sentences.cn: 混合箱的容积约等于41立方英尺.

sentences.en: The cask is capable of holding 8 gallons.
The cask savours of the first fill.
sentences.cn: 酒桶长留初次装酒的香气.

sentences.en: There is a smack of the cask in this wine.
They sell cider at 10 dollars a cask.
sentences.cn: 他们以每桶十美元的价钱出售苹果酒.

sentences.en: Yep. And I brought a cask full of whiskey!
sentences.cn: 准备好了. 我还带了一整桶威士忌!

trans.tran_cn: （尤指盛酒精饮料的）桶，一桶的量
trans.tran_en: a round wooden container used for storing wine or other liquids, or the amount of liquid that it contains
